eventDecorators.name: onTokenPurchase
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: onTokenSell
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: onReinvestment
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: onWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: Transfer
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

functionDecorators.name: dividendsOf
functionDecorators.description: Retrieve the dividend balance of any single address.

functionDecorators.name: calculateTokensReceived
functionDecorators.description: Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of buy orders.

functionDecorators.name: calculateEthereumReceived
functionDecorators.description: Function for the frontend to dynamically retrieve the price scaling of sell orders.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws all of the callers earnings.

functionDecorators.name: sellPrice
functionDecorators.description: Return the buy price of 1 individual token.

functionDecorators.name: myDividends
functionDecorators.description: Retrieve the dividends owned by the caller. If `_includeReferralBonus` is to to 1/true, the referral bonus will be included in the calculations. The reason for this, is that in the frontend, we will want to get the total divs (global + ref) But in the internal calculations, we want them separate.

functionDecorators.name: totalEthereumBalance
functionDecorators.description: Method to view the current Ethereum stored in the contract Example: totalEthereumBalance().

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Retrieve the token balance of any single address.

functionDecorators.name: buyPrice
functionDecorators.description: Return the sell price of 1 individual token.

functionDecorators.name: myTokens
functionDecorators.description: Retrieve the tokens owned by the caller.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfer coins from the caller to a new holder. Remember, there's a 10% fee.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: Converts all incoming ethereum to coins for the caller, and passes down the referral addy (if any).

functionDecorators.name: reinvest
functionDecorators.description: Converts all of caller's dividends to tokens.
